cwitools.qso module¶

CWITools QSO-Finder class for interactive PSF fitting.

This module contains the class definition for the interactive tool ‘QSO Finder.’ QSO finder is used to accurately locate point sources (usually QSOs) when running fixWCS in CWITools.reduction.
